title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, September 18, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Swedish-American actress Greta Garbo (1905-1990), who made 28 movies before retiring at the age of 35.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Swedish-American actress Greta Garbo (1905-1990), who made 28 movies before retiring at the age of 35.
